sqlMap.select:
SELECT PT.PLNAME AS name,INCAR.innum,OUTCAR.outnum FROM ( SELECT PL."NAME" AS PLNAME,PAS."NAME" AS PASNAME FROM T_PARKING_LOT PL LEFT JOIN T_PASSAGES PAS ON PL."ID"=PAS.PARKINGLOT_ID UNION SELECT '空','空' FROM DUAL ) PT
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) innum, NVL(PL."NAME",'空') AS "NAME" FROM T_PARKING_ORDER PO LEFT JOIN T_PASSAGES PAS ON PO.IN_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME=PAS."ID" LEFT JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PL."ID"=PAS.PARKINGLOT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND to_char(PO.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #GTE_startTime#
AND to_char(PO.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #LTE_endTime#
GROUP BY PL."NAME" ) INCAR ON INCAR."NAME"=PT.PLNAME LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) outnum, NVL(PL."NAME",'空') AS "NAME" FROM T_PARKING_ORDER PO LEFT JOIN T_PASSAGES PAS ON PO.OUT_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME=PAS."ID" LEFT JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PL."ID"=PAS.PARKINGLOT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND to_char(PO.OUT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #GTE_startTime#
AND to_char(PO.OUT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #LTE_endTime#
GROUP BY PL."NAME" ) OUTCAR ON OUTCAR."NAME"=PT.PLNAME GROUP BY PT.PLNAME,INCAR.innum,OUTCAR.outnum ORDER BY PT.PLNAME

SELECT PT.PLNAME AS name,INCAR.innum,OUTCAR.outnum FROM ( SELECT PL."NAME" AS PLNAME,PAS."NAME" AS PASNAME FROM T_PARKING_LOT PL LEFT JOIN T_PASSAGES PAS ON PL."ID"=PAS.PARKINGLOT_ID UNION SELECT '空','空' FROM DUAL ) PT
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) innum, NVL(PL."NAME",'空') AS "NAME" FROM T_PARKING_ORDER PO LEFT JOIN T_PASSAGES PAS ON PO.IN_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME=PAS."ID" LEFT JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PL."ID"=PAS.PARKINGLOT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND to_char(PO.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #GTE_startTime#
AND to_char(PO.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #LTE_endTime#
GROUP BY PL."NAME" ) INCAR ON INCAR."NAME"=PT.PLNAME LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) outnum, NVL(PL."NAME",'空') AS "NAME" FROM T_PARKING_ORDER PO LEFT JOIN T_PASSAGES PAS ON PO.OUT_SCHOOL_DOOR_NAME=PAS."ID" LEFT JOIN T_PARKING_LOT PL ON PL."ID"=PAS.PARKINGLOT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND to_char(PO.OUT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #GTE_startTime#
AND to_char(PO.OUT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #LTE_endTime#
GROUP BY PL."NAME" ) OUTCAR ON OUTCAR."NAME"=PT.PLNAME GROUP BY PT.PLNAME,INCAR.innum,OUTCAR.outnum ORDER BY PT.PLNAME
